thread.section_title: Egerton House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: This is how you do 5*
thread.title_full: This is how you do 5* - Review of Egerton House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Hannah S
title: This is how you do 5*
text: We only stayed two nights but I would quite happily have moved in. From start to finish we were welcomed, looked after amazingly and made so comfortable. It is 5* so you know they have their bases covered, however no small detail has been overlooked and they all add up to a superior experience. Even down to a lit candle in the bathroom on your turn-down, knowing you will want a soak after a long day. Wonderful people, beautiful hotel and great location.
